Rulings.Base: 1. Tributing 1 face-up "Gravekeeper's" monster is a cost.\n2. This effect targets 1 card your opponent controls.\n3. If you gain control of the card targeted by this effect before it resolves, that card is not destroyed.

PSCT.Edison: ① You can tribute other 1 face-up "Gravekeeper's" monster, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.
PSCT.Tengu: ① You can tribute other 1 face-up "Gravekeeper's" monster, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.
